name: Jacob's Landing
description: Jacob's Landing was once a majestic hub of intergalactic traffic. What once was the most densely populated metropolitan planet in the galactic core connected to the Landing and then onward to the farthest reaches of space. Mythic nations and journeys sprang into creation and receded once more. Now this lonely derelict station is a ghost town and occasional site of ramblings by unfathomable beings.
